headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Deathmatch and Race Creator Beta Now Available
content:
The latest free update to GTA Online includes the Deathmatch and Race Creator Beta.

Craft your own custom blood-soaked gunfights, high-octane street races and more - then publish them via the Rockstar Games Social Club for the whole community to discover, download, play, rate and share.

Access the Deathmatch and Race Creator Beta by heading to Online > Creator in the GTA Online Pause Menu.
